response.overview: It's the last summer before college and two best friends, Adam and Jared, are out of luck. All of their efforts towards a summer job have not been fruitful. Their hope seems to be the summer camp they spent most of their childhood, Camp Deer Song. Through both triumphs and heartbreaks, this final free summer will test not only their friendship, but also their outlook on life itself.
response.title: The Summer Before

release_dates.note: Theatrical release was 2/19/2013, film year is 2012
